pipeline.tutorial_pipeline.name: Tutorial Pipeline
Enable hard shadows from the sky
config.tutorial_pipeline.shadow.resoluti: The resolution of the shadow map
config.tutorial_pipeline.shadow.sunlight: The angle that the sunlight hits blocks
config.tutorial_pipeline.shading_type.de: The type of shading to use
config.tutorial_pipeline.posterization.l: The number of levels to posterize to
config.tutorial_pipeline.cel_shading.ste: The number of brightness levels to use for cel shading
config.tutorial_pipeline.cel_shading.smo: Smooth the cel shading effect before filtering
config.tutorial_pipeline.sky.enabled.des: Replace the vanilla sky with a custom sky
